Articles.Content:
Hello, 

i see this : [http://www.beamng.com/](http://www.beamng.com/)

A wonderfull physics engine. Please take a tour on !
I really don't see replacing rigid body physics with soft body physics as practical at this time, and even switching out one rigid body physics engine for another is on the do-not-suggest list.
Sorry Cortek56, this won't be happening, Squad are committed to Unity5 and PhysX 3.3
